article.title: Luong Assigned to Office of the Deputy Chief of Staff, G-8

tags.tag: Office of the Deputy Chief of Staff
Office of the U.S. Army Deputy Chief of Staff G-8

article.text: Brig. Gen. Viet X. Luong, USA, has been assigned as director, joint and integration, Office of the Deputy Chief of Staff, G-8, U.S. Army, Washington, D.C.
